unnormalised: Konnem tor time zone-anchea bodlantolea vixim vicharlem, khas korun IST ani her zone-anchea modem, mhunn mhaka laglem hanv thoddi mahiti vanttun gheun. Indian Standard Time (IST) ani her time zone-anchea modem bodol korop kednam kednam trasdaik zaunk xakta, khas korun jednam tea her bhaganim divsel'lo uzvadd samballpacho vell (DST) choltat tednam. Tumkam zannam astolem, IST mhunnge GMT+5:30, ani Bharat DST pallona, jenna amchea shevottak thoddi sopai zata.

Punn, America va UK sarke des DST palltat, sadharanponnim March-an thaun November-meren. Hacho orth mhunnge IST ani EDT (Eastern Daylight Time) hanchalem antar ek sarke 9 voram 30 minute nasta, punn tem vorsachea velar bodolta. Udharonnank, March 12ver thaun, 2023 Novembrache 5ver, 2023 meren, velachem antar fokot 9 voram ani 30 minute asunk xakta, ani magir tem portun 10 voram 30 minute zata. Sogllya tarikhi ani khasgi offsets porikxa korun gheiat, jenna tumchea khatir on-line sodunk va time zone badol korpeak sopem zata.

Anik, thoddea bhaganim vegllench offset aasa. Nepal Standard Time (NPT) mhunnge GMT+5:45, IST-chea fudden fokot 15 minute. Toxench, Australia-chea thoddea bhaganim adhea-voreachem offset aasa, ani tanche DST-cheo suchiyo khub vegveglyo aaso. Jednam hanv antar'raxttriya boskank timbunk vortam, hanv sadharanponnim World Time Buddy vo toxench her platforms vaprunk yentam jem hi badlanchi badlavnni kortat; na tor, boska sokallim 10:00 AM EST-cher 16/11/2024 mhaka jevnnacher sust zagear ratchea 7:30 PM IST-cher tayari korunk mellttali.

Nimannem, yead dovrat tumi purai tarik ani vell ullekh korunk, time zone-anchea sangata, kosli-i golmott dovrunk nhoi. Udharonnank, fokot "Boska 2 PM-cher" mhunnop puronam. "Boska 2:00 PM PST-cher 28/02/2024" mhunnop sopeponn dita. Toxench, tarikhechea akarachea antaranchi vollokh gheunk, DD/MM/YYYY virudh MM/DD/YYYY sarke, zaiti suraksha korun. Hem khachi kortat soglle ekuch panacher asat, kiteak tanchea zageachea bodlak.

normalised: Eka zannem time zone conversionache vixayant prashn vicharlo, khas korun I-S-T ani her zonanche madhye, ten'na mhaka dislem hanvem kaim mahiti vanttun gheunk. Indian Standard Time (I-S-T) ani her time zonanche madhye conversion korop kadhink kadhin kathin zaunk xakta, khas korun jevha her bhaganim divas ulouvni vell (D-S-T) chalu asta. I-S-T, tumkam khobor asa tenna, G-M-T plus panch voram tis minutam, ani Bharat D-S-T pallo dina, zaka lagun amchea vatenin vostu sopo zata.

Tori astana, U-S vo U-K sarkhea desanim D-S-T pallo ditat, sadharonponni March te November meren. Hacho arth I-S-T ani E-D-T (Eastern Daylight Time) hanchea madhli antar sathot nau voram tis minutam nam, punn vorsache velar bodlota. Udahoronnak, March bara, don hozar ani tevis te November panch, don hozar ani tevis meren, velachi antar fakt nau voram ani tis minutam asunk xakta, ani magir tem porot dha voram ani tis minutam zata. Sathot tarik ani khasa offset zanchi double-check kara, jem ek online sodh vo time zone converter vaprun sopem zata.

Ani, kaim bhaganim asadharon offsets asatat. Nepal Standard Time (N-P-T) G-M-T plus panch voram chavalis minutam asa, fakt pondra minutam I-S-T-chea mukhar. Tech bhaxen, Australia-chea kaim bhaganim ordho vorache offsets asatat, ani tanche D-S-T-che schedules zaitich bodlotat. Jeuhn hanv antarrashtriya meetings-che scheduling karta, hanv zaite pavtim World Time Buddy vo tachye sarkhea tools vaprunk prayatn korta je dinamically he bodlavank adjust kortat; na tor, dha A-M E-S-T sixteen November don hozar ani chavisechie meetingek sat tis P-M I-S-T jeunnachea uprant aram korchea bodla me prepping mellounk xakta.

Shevttak, puro tarik ani vell time zonecher sangun ulo korat, konfushan avoid korpak. Udahoronnak, "Meeting don P-M" sarki sangonk puro nam. "Meeting don zero zero P-M P-S-T twenty eighth February don hozar ani chavisechea" sangop sarki asat. Ani, tarik formatant antaranchi nod ghetat, D-D slash M-M slash Y-Y-Y-Y versus M-M slash D-D slash Y-Y-Y-Y, addhich suraksha kiteak. Tem nirdharit korta eka panner savko asa, te kitei kite tharleli asatat.
